name: RJ City's French Press (Desktop)
description:
*Follow my twitch channel: nolashgirl

HOW TO PLAY:

-Use SPACE KEY to jump.

-Jump over the French presses and earn points

-If you get hit by the French press, you start from 0.

-If you jump but touch the French press, you start from 1. 

-Turning on sound is recommended

****Game is free to play! My purpose of making these games are for people to laugh and have fun playing them. Developing games do take time and I fully invest my time in making sure they're enjoyable. For that reason, I take donations if anyone would like to support me but certainly not a  requirement! 

Paypal: https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=NF4968MVMEFGN
